title: PDF - save - access to folder denied
text: If a customer has problems saving pdfs of reports, e.g. the financial report they get after completing the cash statement in the evening, it might be a problem with the virus checker (e.g. Avast). Check if anything has been quarantened, especially SendPOSInfo.exe. If so, it's a part of the POS program and should be whitelisted. Create an exception in Avast for the entire POS program. That will fix the problem.
description:
If a customer has problems saving pdfs of reports, e.g. the financial report they get after completing the cash statement in the evening, it might be a problem with the virus checker (e.g. Avast). 

  

Check if anything has been quarantened, especially SendPOSInfo.exe. 

  

If so, it's a part of the POS program and should be whitelisted. 

  

Create an exception in Avast for the entire POS program. 

  

That will fix the problem.

title: PDF - won't open - gives error message
text: If the customer tries to open a pdf from the POS (e.g. a report) and gets an error message saying that the document is already open, it is usually because Adobe Acrobat Reader or another PDF is open already (might not be visible.) Open Windows Task Manager and check if there are any instances of Adobe Acrobat running. If yes, close them, and then try opening the PDF again.
description:
If the customer tries to open a pdf from the POS (e.g. a report) and gets an error message saying that the document is already open, it is usually because Adobe Acrobat Reader or another PDF is open already (might not be visible.) 

  

Open Windows Task Manager and check if there are any instances of Adobe Acrobat running. If yes, close them, and then try opening the PDF again.
